steps.title: YW occasionally stands for â€œYearling Weight.â€
steps.content: YW occasionally stands for â€œYearling Weight.â€ In the cattle community, YW represents the combined weight of a calf before and after itâ€™s weaned. As the name suggests, YW gets measured in pounds. [4] X Research source Example: The YW was 900 lb (410 kg).

steps.title: YW can mean â€œYoung Womenâ€ in the context of the Mormon church.
steps.content: YW can mean â€œYoung Womenâ€ in the context of the Mormon church. The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints (also known as the Mormon Church) manages an organization called Young Women. [5] X Research source On occasion, this group name may be abbreviated as YW. Example: â€œI think YW is sponsoring the event on Friday.â€
